statements: UPDATE user_profiles SET full_name='John Doe', phone_number='123-456-7890' WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_profiles SET email='jane.doe@example.com', address='123 Main St' WHERE user_id='87654321-12d3-45e8-aabb-009876543210';
UPDATE user_profiles SET full_name = 'John Doe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_profiles SET email = 'janedoe@example.com', address = '123 Main St', phone_number = '+1 123-456-7890' WHERE user_id = '98765432-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_profiles SET first_name='Alice', last_name='Smith' WHERE user_id=12345;
UPDATE user_preferences SET language_preference='Spanish', music_preference='Classical' WHERE user_id=54321;
UPDATE user_profiles SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe' WHERE user_id=101
UPDATE user_preferences SET music_preference='Rock', audio_book_preference='Mystery', driving_preference='Highway', language_preference='English' WHERE user_id=102
UPDATE UserProfiles SET user_name = 'John Doe', age = 30 WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE VehiclePreferences SET ambient_lighting = 'Blue', temperature = 72 WHERE vehicle_id = 54321;
UPDATE UserProfiles SET age = 35, gender = 'Male' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE VehiclePreferences SET temperature = 23, ambient_lighting = 'Blue' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE UserProfiles SET first_name='John', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE VehicleSettings SET temperature=75, music_preference='Rock' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE UserProfiles SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE VehicleSettings SET temperature=70, music_preference='Rock' WHERE user_id=(SELECT user_id FROM UserProfiles WHERE email='john.doe@example.com');
UPDATE UserProfile SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe' WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE VehicleInfo SET color='Red', license_plate='ABC123' WHERE vehicle_id='98765432-1234-5678-abcd-87654321dcba';
UPDATE UserProfile SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE Services SET description = 'Full Service Package including oil change, tire rotation, and engine check' WHERE service_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
